pullRequest.title: Reposync bugfixes
pullRequest.bodyText:
What does this PR change?
Bugfixes to regressions introduced by reposync speedups: #2154 #2157 #2162 #2164
GUI diff
No difference.

 DONE

Documentation


No documentation needed: bugfixes


 DONE


Test coverage


No tests: will be covered in upcoming integration tests


 DONE


Links
See also #2154 #2157 #2162 #2164

 DONE

If you don't need a changelog check, please mark this checkbox:

 No changelog needed

Re-run a test
If you need to re-run a test, please mark the related checkbox, it will be unchecked automatically once it has re-run:

 Re-run test "changelog_test"
 Re-run test "backend_unittests_pgsql"
 Re-run test "java_lint_checkstyle"
 Re-run test "java_pgsql_tests"

 Re-run test "susemanager_unittests"
 Re-run test "javascript_lint"
 Re-run test "spacecmd_unittests"

commit.message:
bugfix: correct number of processes in reposync

This will use two processes per logical CPU, up to a maximum of 32.

beforeCommit.message:
bugfix: prevent traceback if element is None

Following traceback would be produced for certain repos:

```
...
  File "/usr/lib/python3.6/site-packages/spacewalk/server/importlib/
backend.py", line 671, in lookupEVRs
    for evr in sorted(evrHash.keys(), key=lambda x: (x[0] if x[0] != '' else 
None, x[1], x[2])):
TypeError: '<' not supported between instances of 'int' and 'NoneType'
```

afterCommit.message:
bugfix: prevent traceback if element is None

Following traceback would be produced for certain repos:

```
...
  File "/usr/lib/python3.6/site-packages/spacewalk/server/importlib/
backend.py", line 671, in lookupEVRs
    for evr in sorted(evrHash.keys(), key=lambda x: (x[0] if x[0] != '' else
None, x[1], x[2])):
TypeError: '<' not supported between instances of 'int' and 'NoneType'
```

nodes.bodyText: (k or 0) sounds wrong. Should it be (k[0] or 0) ?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -668,7 +669,7 @@ def lookupErrataSeverityId(self, erratum):
     def lookupEVRs(self, evrHash):
         sql = "select LOOKUP_EVR(:epoch, :version, :release) id from dual"
         h = self.dbmodule.prepare(sql)
-        for evr in sorted(evrHash.keys(), key=lambda x: (x[0] if x[0] != '' else None, x[1], x[2])):
+        for evr in sorted(evrHash.keys(), key=lambda k: (str(k or 0), k[1], k[2])):

commit.message:
bugfix: prevent traceback if element is None

Following traceback would be produced for certain repos:

```
...
  File "/usr/lib/python3.6/site-packages/spacewalk/server/importlib/
backend.py", line 671, in lookupEVRs
    for evr in sorted(evrHash.keys(), key=lambda x: (x[0] if x[0] != '' else
None, x[1], x[2])):
TypeError: '<' not supported between instances of 'int' and 'NoneType'
```
